languages.text: "Понял, что попался. Да и еретики любят бахвалиться своими мерзостями".
"He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
languages.original_text: "Понял, что попался. Да и еретики любят бахвалиться своими мерзостями".

traits.locale_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
"He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
"He realised he was done for. Besides, a cultist will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
"He realised he was done for. Besides, a cultist will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
"He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
"He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."

languages.text: « Il a compris qu'il était fichu. Sans compter que les hérétiques se précipitent sur la moindre occasion d'étaler au grand jour leurs pratiques impies. »
languages.original_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."

traits.locale_text: « Il a compris qu'il était fichu. Sans compter que les fanatiques se précipitent sur la moindre occasion d'étaler au grand jour leurs pratiques impies. »

languages.text: «Se ha dado cuenta de que está condenado. Además, un hereje nunca deja pasar la ocasión de jactarse de sus fechorías».
languages.original_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha dado cuenta de que está condenado. Además, un cultista nunca deja pasar la ocasión de jactarse de sus fechorías».

languages.text: “因为他意识到他已经无路可逃了。而且，那些异端分子会抓住一切机会吹嘘他们的邪恶罪行。”
languages.original_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."

traits.locale_text: “因为他意识到他已经无路可逃了。而且，那些邪教分子会抓住一切机会吹嘘他们的邪恶罪行。”

languages.text: 「彼はもう終わりだと悟ったんだ。それに、異端者は自分たちの邪悪なやり方をほくそ笑むためなら、どんなチャンスでもものにするだろう」
languages.original_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はもう終わりだと悟ったんだ。さらに、カルト信者は自分たちの邪悪なやり方をほくそ笑むためなら、どんなチャンスでもものにするだろう」

languages.text: "Er hat erkannt, dass er erledigt ist. Zudem: Ein Ketzer nutzt jede Gelegenheit, um mit seinen Niedertracht zu prahlen."
languages.original_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat erkannt, dass er erledigt ist. Zudem: Ein Kultist nutzt jede Gelegenheit, um mit seinen Niedertracht zu prahlen."

languages.text: "İşinin bittiğinin farkına vardı. Ayrıca kâfirler, habis yöntemlerine dair böbürlenmek için her fırsatı değerlendirir."
languages.original_text: "He realised he was done for. Besides, a heretic will take any chance they get to gloat about their wicked ways."
